verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
C
Verse 1
I am the Lord's
Oh joy beyond expression
Oh sweet response to
Voice of love divine
Faith's joyous 'Yes' to
The assuring whisper
'Fear not I have redeemed thee
Thou art mine'

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I am the Lord's
It is the glad confession
Wherewith the bride
Recalls the happy day
When love's 'I will'
Accepted him forever
'The Lord's to love
To honor and obey

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I am the Lord's
Yet teach me all it meaneth
All it involves of love and loyalty
Of holy service
Absolute surrender
And unreserved
Obedience unto Thee

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
I am the Lord's
Yes body soul and spirit
Oh seal them
Irrecoverably Thine
As Thou beloved in
Thy grace and fullness
Forever and forevermore
Art mine
